surfca.st.title: surfca.st
surfca.st.description: This is one of my private projects, to try out new stuff and test the latest technologies. Surfca.st is a mobile surf forecast application. It's mostly used by myself for weekend surf trips around Victoria :-)
surfca.st.challenge: Providing a native application feeling in the mobile browser (Android & iOS)
